properties.name: Bedder Bedder & Moore
properties.description: Posted by 300driver1730 Abbey pl, Charlotte, NCGood sandwiches. They always serve soup with each meal.

properties.name: Best Buy
properties.description: Posted by 300driver2650 N CLARK ST, Chicago, IL, 60614We went to this Best Buy to purchase some mp3 players - the day after Thanksgiving.

properties.name: Brew & View at the Vic
properties.description: Posted by 300driver3145 North Sheffield Avenue, Chicago, IL, 60657The Vic was where we saw La Oreja de Van Gogh perform the day before Thanksgiving. They were absolutely amazing. The Vic is small, but that was a good thing -- we were very close to the band.

properties.name: Cermak Court
properties.description: Posted by 300driver2509 W Cermak Rd, Chicago IL 60608Another shopping center close by to the apartment. Has Payless Shoe Source, Radio Shack, and an Aldi.

properties.name: Disney Store
properties.description: Posted by 300driver717 N Michigan Ave, Chicago Il 60611Pris was able to find some stuff for her nephews and nieces here.

properties.name: Fair Play
properties.description: Posted by 300driver2200 S Western Ave, Chicago Il 60608Another grocery store close by. It was open on Thanksgiving Day!

properties.name: Filene's Basement
properties.description: Posted by 300driver830 N Michigan Ave, Chicago IL 60611Next to the water tower, this is a huge store with lots of good quality clothing for men and women.

properties.name: Gap
properties.description: Posted by 300driver744 N Michigan Ave, Chicago, ILAnother typical Gap.

properties.name: Giordano's
properties.description: Posted by 300driver135 E Lake St, Chicago, IL 60601I liked the food, but the service wasn\'t that great. Of course, we went there at the busiest time possible, so I am willing to cut them some slack. We ended up being seated in the bar. At least it was non-smoking.

properties.name: Levi's
properties.description: Posted by 300driver600 N Michigan Ave # B, Chicago, IL 60611A very interesting store. I liked the layout and the salespeople were very friendly.

properties.name: Navy Pier
properties.description: Posted by 300driver600 e grand ave, chicago, ilWe went there at night. Not a lot of places open, but it had a great view of the lake front.

properties.name: O'Hare
properties.description: Posted by 300driver10000 Bessie Coleman Dr, Chicago IL 60666

properties.name: O'Hare
properties.description: Posted by 300driver519 E Cargo Rd Chicago IL 60666

properties.name: O'Hare Airport
properties.description: Posted by 300driver515 Express Center Dr # B, Chicago IL 60666The place of my arrival and departure. You can take the train right to the airport!

properties.name: O'Hare International Airport
properties.description: Posted by 300driver610 N Cargo Access Rd, Chicago, Il 60666

properties.name: Old Navy
properties.description: Posted by 300driver1596 N Kingsbury St, Chicago, IL 60622

properties.name: Quaker Steak & Lube
properties.description: Posted by 300driver1601 E Woodlawn Rd, Charlotte, NCA great place for an awesome lunch buffet

properties.name: Robert's Apartment
properties.description: Posted by 300driver2653 W 21st Pl, Chicago, IL 60608This was the homebase for my trip to Chicagoland.

properties.name: Staples
properties.description: Posted by 300driver2558 West Cermak Road, Chicago, IL 60608This Staples place is very convenient to where Robert lives. Everyone there is bi-linugal.

properties.name: Staples
properties.description: Posted by 300driverI really like this Staples. Everyone who works there is bi-lingual.

properties.name: Victoria's Secret
properties.description: Posted by 300driver2828 N Clark St, Chicago, IL 60657A very nice store. Pris went looking for a wedding present here, but really didn\'t find anything she liked. Her package from Best Buy set off the alarm.
